mapper.select: SELECT AC211.CNTR_NO , AC211.CNTR_SN , NVL(VS172.SPMT_CST_SV_U_AG_YN,'N') AS SPMT_CST_SV_U_AG_YN /*건강케어서비스 이용동의*/ , NVL(VS172.PIF_THP_OFR_AG_YN,'N') AS PIF_THP_OFR_AG_YN /*개인정보 제3자 제공 동의*/ , NVL(VS172.AGP_NM,SSCT4.RCGVP_KNM) AS AGP_NM/*동의자 성명*/ , SSCT4.RCGVP_KNM AS CST_NM , SSCT4.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , SSCT4.MEXNO_ENCR , SSCT4.CRAL_IDV_TNO , AC221.CST_SV_ASN_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ AC211 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ AC221 /*고객서비스AS설치배정내역*/ ON AC221.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC221.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ AC201 ON AC201.CNTR_NO = AC221.CNTR_NO AND AC201.CNTR_SN = AC221.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_SPMT_SV_PIF_U_AG_IZ VS172 /*추가서비스개인정보이용동의내역*/ ON VS172.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CNTR_NO = VS172.CNTR_NO AND AC211.CNTR_SN = VS172.CNTR_SN AND SPMT_CST_SV_CD = '01' /*건강케어*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SSCT2 /*계약상세*/ ON SSCT2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CNTR_NO = SSCT2.CNTR_NO AND AC211.CNTR_SN = SSCT2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL SSCT3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON SSCT3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CNTR_NO = SSCT3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND SSCT3.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') /*설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SSCT3.VL_STRT_DTM AND SSCT3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS SSCT4 ON SSCT4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SSCT3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = SSCT4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID WHERE AC211.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC221.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' /*작업완료*/ AND AC211.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE '11%' AND AC201.IST_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND AC201.PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM04100842', 'WM04100843', 'WM04100844', 'WM04100845', 'WM04100846', 'WM04100847', 'WM04100857', 'WM04100858', 'WM04100856') UNION ALL SELECT AC211.CNTR_NO , AC211.CNTR_SN , NVL(VS172.SPMT_CST_SV_U_AG_YN,'N') AS SPMT_CST_SV_U_AG_YN /*건강케어서비스 이용동의*/ , NVL(VS172.PIF_THP_OFR_AG_YN,'N') AS PIF_THP_OFR_AG_YN /*개인정보 제3자 제공 동의*/ , NVL(VS172.AGP_NM,SSCT4.RCGVP_KNM) AS AGP_NM/*동의자 성명*/ , SSCT4.RCGVP_KNM AS CST_NM , SSCT4.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , SSCT4.MEXNO_ENCR , SSCT4.CRAL_IDV_TNO , AC221.CST_SV_ASN_NO FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ AC211 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ AC221 /*고객서비스AS설치배정내역*/ ON AC221.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CST_SV_ASN_NO = AC221.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ AC201 ON AC201.CNTR_NO = AC221.CNTR_NO AND AC201.CNTR_SN = AC221.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_SPMT_SV_PIF_U_AG_IZ VS172 /*추가서비스개인정보이용동의내역*/ ON VS172.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CNTR_NO = VS172.CNTR_NO AND AC211.CNTR_SN = VS172.CNTR_SN AND SPMT_CST_SV_CD = '01' /*건강케어*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SSCT2 /*계약상세*/ ON SSCT2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CNTR_NO = SSCT2.CNTR_NO AND AC211.CNTR_SN = SSCT2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL SSCT3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON SSCT3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC211.CNTR_NO = SSCT3.CNTR_NO AND SSCT3.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') /*설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN SSCT3.VL_STRT_DTM AND SSCT3.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS SSCT4 ON SSCT4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SSCT3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = SSCT4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID WHERE AC221.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND AC221.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' /*작업완료*/ AND AC221.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD LIKE '11%' AND AC201.IST_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND (SELECT PD_PRP_VAL20 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.PD_CD = AC201.PDCT_PD_CD) IN ('92','93') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_SSCT_FGPT_RCP_IZ A1 WHERE A1.DTL_CNTR_NO = AC201.CNTR_NO AND A1.DTL_CNTR_SN = AC201.CNTR_SN AND A1.FGPT_PD_CD = 'WM07101015')
